appDesc.message: Summarize YouTube videos, web pages, and translate text with ChatGPT, helping you read and write in your mother tongue, all for free

always_tip.message: AI automatically generates summaries for searches or YouTube videos

manually_tip.message: When the [Generate Summary] button is manually clicked, the AI produces a summary of the content.

language_tip.message: For AI responses, the language setting is recommended to be set to 'auto'.

gpt3_5tip.message: GPT-3.5 is unlimited for Free and Plus users.

gpt4_tip.message: GPT-4 is for Plus users and has a very limited quota.

open_ai_tip.message: OpenAI official API, more stable, charge by usage

enable_disable_tip.message: You can enable/disable the Glarity Summary on the following website.

show_icon_tip.message: Once hidden, the Glarity icon will no longer appear on the page. However, you can open the page summary by clicking on the browser extension icon.

whitelist_sites_tip.message: Only display the Glarity icon on these sites (one URL per line).

blacklist_sites_tip.message: Do not display Glarity icon on these sites (one URL per line).

login_tip.message: Please login and pass Cloudflare check at {{site}}

extract_gist.message: Extract the gist of the above.

what_above.message: What's key takeaways from the above?

summary_support.message: Summary of support for Amazon products and YouTube video comments.

popup_summary_title.message: When I select a word or phrase:

popup_summary_tip.message: Display icon that I can click to show pop-up.

summary_full.message: Full content summary, but will consume more of your key quota.

summary_brief.message: Brief Summary: Fewer tokens used, but there may be omissions in the summary.

use_openai_tip.message: Note: Using the OpenAI API key pattern will give you more accurate answers.

keep_this_tip.message: Keep this tab to make ChatGPT more stable.

login_chatGpt_tip.message: Login to the ChatGPT web application to use the Glarity Summary.

disable_pop_tip.message: Do you really want to disable Pop-up summary?

page_not_supported.message: Sorry, this page is not supported.

pop_tip.message: You can turn it on in the Options Pop-up summary.

asking_tip.message: Glarity is generating questions related to the keyword

gpt_401.message: Failed to load response, please check the API key.

chat_tip.message: Note: The asking feature will consume more of your key quota.

comment_summary_tip.message: Summary of support for Amazon products and YouTube video comments.

how_to_use.message: Connect to AI for quick Glarity summaries and translations

three_ways_to_access.message: Glarity, your cross-language reading assistant, provides six ways to connect to AI services. Choose the method that best suits your needs to link with AI providers.

have_chatgpt_account.message: When you have a ChatGPT account

chatgpt_use_desc.message: You must remain logged in to your ChatGPT account on the website. Stability may be inconsistent for both Plus users and free users because of OpenAI’s  restriction. It is recommended for ChatGPT Plus users.

have_openai_key.message: For developers with API key. Support for custom keys from any AI vendor

openai_use_desc.message: The official OpenAI API is more stable and charges are based on usage. Follow the guide to get the API key.

have_azure_key.message: For developers with Azure API key

azure_use_desc.message: A research and development engineer utilizing Azure OpenAI services can benefit from a more stable service.

chatgpt_default_desc.message: The default is unlimited for Free and Plus users.

chatgpt_gpt4_desc.message: GPT-4 is for Plus users and has a very limited quota.

token_exceeds_limit_toast.message: Sorry, the Prompt is over the limit, try translating it into English and saving it or reducing the word count.

guide_desc.message: Enjoy the efficient reading of the Glarity Summary~

enter_openai_key_toast.message: Please enter your OpenAI API Key

free_quota_exhausted.message: The free quota is all used up

login_chatgpt_and_refresh_page.message: Please login to $ai$ and refresh this page

use_openai_enhanced.message: Using the OpenAI API key for an better experience

find_create_openai_key.message: You can find or create your API key here

change_openai_api.message: If this keeps happening, change Al provider to OpenAl API in the extension options.

enter_azure_key.message: Please enter your Azure API Key

enter_azure_name.message: Please enter your Azure Deployment Name

enter_claude_key.message: Please enter your Claude API Key

aiAskYoutubeTip.message: Glarity is predicting the questions you might be interested in

glarity_use_desc.message: Glarity API mode employs multiple AI-models to offer you superior AI-assisted services.

glarity_not_use_desc.message:
Glarity harnesses diverse AI models for advanced AI-aided services. Enjoy $size$ free tokens monthly, empowering all with the power of AI.
Upgrade to the $plan$ plan for a larger token allowance and premium features.

is_login_expires_text.message: Get started by signing in to Glarity!

lone_text_tip.message: Switch to 'Glarity' mode for enhanced summaries powered by advanced AI.

ai_chapter_lone_text_tip.message: Switch to 'Glarity Mode' for optimal Key Moments~

welcom_text.message: Explore the world with Glarity's summaries and translations. Your Trusted Reading & Writing Assistant. Click the button to start experimenting.

subscribe_pricing_tip.message: See our pricing for a more detailed analysis of what Glarity has on offer.

sign_in_glarity.message: Sign in to continue enjoying Glarity for free

mail_reply_language_tip.message: These language settings are applicable to any text generated with 'Quick Reply'. The 'Auto' setting matches the language of the incoming email.

mail_reply_tone_tip.message: The selected tone will influence the text generated by the 'Quick Reply' feature

mail_reply_button_tip.message: When you visit your email page:

mail_reply_button_display.message: Display the 'Quick Reply' button on your email page (Support for Gmail and Zoho mail)

mail_reply_button_none.message: Don't show the 'Quick Reply' button on your email page

security_statement.message: Be assured that our product is fortified with the latest cybersecurity measures. Your safety is our top priority.

guide_to_glarity_mode.message: If this persists, it is recommended that you switch to Glarity mode (Faster and more stable)

option_translate_target_language_same_as.message: Same as the Glarity output language

option_translate_target_language_desc.message: Translate other languages into the language you set

option_translate_white_list_desc.message: Translation will always be performed for the following sites

option_translate_black_list.message: Do not translate the following websites

option_translate_black_list_desc.message: Websites listed here will not be subjected to translation.

option_translate_list_tip.message:
There is support for domain names and wildcard entries. Please enter a domain name on each line.
Examples: *.google.com, google.com/mail/*, https://www.google.com/*

option_translate_icon_desc.message: Select this option to display the 'Translate' icon. On clicking it, the webpage you are currently viewing will be instantly translated

option_translate_icon_auto_display.message: Automatically display the translation icon on the page

option_translate_icon_auto_display_desc.message: The translation icon will automatically be displayed when the language of the current page differs from the target language.

option_translate_icon_always_display.message: Always show the translation icon on the page

option_translate_icon_never_display.message: Don't display the translation icon on the page

option_translate_context_menu_desc.message: When enabled, a shortcut for translating or reverting to the original text will be added to your browser's right-click menu

retry_translate_tip.message: Retry translation for all error paragraphs

no_translation_error_tip.message: GPT did not return translation content, please try translating again

differenceTable_title_tip.message: (Compared to the constrained ChatGPT, Glarity delivers superior services; the comparison is based on ChatGPT's default model, GPT-3.5/4K tokens.)

limited_summary.message: Supports only summary up to 4K tokens

unlimited_side_summary.message: Supports up to 10x parallel translations per second

limited_side_summary.message: Supports only a single translation stream

limited_qa_summary.message: Supports only questions up to 4K tokens

Compose_welcome_subtitle.message: Describe what you want to write and the AI will generate a draft for you

Compose_input_placeholder.message: Describe in detail what you want to change

chat_placeholder.message: Ask Glarity Anything About This Page

usage_reached.message: Your plan's usage limit has been reached. Sign in to Glarity to continue enjoying your free experience.

usage_used.message: Your plan's usage has been used up.Upgrade your plan for additional credits.

create_twitter.message: Craft a Tweet for this Page

Quote_Page_Tip.message: When enabled, you can bring in the content of the current page as a reference when writing

error_glarity_normal_tip.message: 👩‍💼 Need assistance? Feel free to reach out to our customer service at support@sparticle.com anytime.

error_guide_to_chatgpt_mode.message: 👉 Switch to ChatGPT mode for free and continue use

error_guide_to_glarity_mode.message: 👉 Switch to Glarity Mode for faster and stable service

error_guide_to_google_mode.message: 👉 Change the translation engine to Google Translate service

error_guide_to_llm_mode.message: 👉 Change the translation engine to LLM service

error_chatgpt_429_desc.message: Google Translate is stepping in for the moment. We'll switch back automatically once available

option_translate_service_llm_title.message: Use your default LLM engine (Translate longer texts for better quality)

option_translate_service_llm_desc.message: For example, OpenAI Api\Glarity Mode (Should LLM be unable to offer translation services, Google Translate will serve as the backup)

option_global_search_desc.message: Provides English search recommendations when searching for keywords in Google

disable_global_search_title.message: Are you sure you want to disable Global Search?

disable_global_search_enable_tip.message: *You can enable it again from the Options

error_guide_to_bing_mode.message: 👉 Change the translation engine to Microsoft Translate service

one_click_prompt_max.message: A maximum of 5 1-Click Prompts can be pinned

one_click_prompt_min.message: At least one 1-Click Prompt must be pinned

one_click_prompt_delete_tip.message: This is the last instruction, please refrain from deleting it

one_click_prompt_title_tip.message: The icon appears when you select text

one_click_prompt_always.message: Always display the 1-Click Prompts icon when you select text

one_click_prompt_display.message: Don't display the 1-Click Prompts icon when you select text

option_translate_service_system_tip.message: Submit the conversation to OpenAI as a system. Use {{ text }} to represent the paragraph's text content, {{ from }} for the source language, and {{ to }} for the target language.

option_translate_service_prompt_tip.message: As a user, send your conversation to OpenAI. Use {{text}} for the paragraph content,{{from}} to indicate the source language, and {{to}} for the target language. It's recommended to omit {{text}} and submit it separately.

network_timeout_tip.message: Connection to the AI service has timed out. Please refresh your page or restart your device.

failed_fetch_tip.message: Connection to the AI service failed. Please check your network and try again

gemini_use_desc.message: Google's DeepMind Gemini API is specifically designed for multimodality.

find_create_gemini_key.message: You can find or create your Google Gemini API key here

one_click_prompt_select_out.message: Your Submitted Text Exceeds the Limit. Please Submit a Shorter Text

search_disable_translated.message: Page translated by Glarity. Click the icon to revert

search_provides_quick.message: Provides quick search for YouTube search for videos in other languages

search_provides_enable.message: Enable Global Search Feature in YouTube Search

search_provides_disable.message: Disable Global Search Feature in YouTube Search

one_click_prompt_example_tip.message: What variables can be included in the prompt?

one_click_prompt_example_select_text.message: The text you selected on the current page. If the prompt does not include this variable, the selected text will be enclosed with triple quotes and placed at the very end of the prompt.

one_click_prompt_example_language.message: If the prompt does not contain the variable, it will default to AI's free expression of language.

Paste or enter the prompt here. The template can include any number of the following variables:{{SELECTED_TEXT}}

pdf_card_tip.message: Glarity PDF AI Viewer enables you to select any text in PDF files and chat with the PDF file

option_translate_service_glarity_desc.message: The Deep Translation Engine enhances the accuracy and readability of translations (The enhancement engine relies on LLM-AI to polish and optimize translations, please ensure the AI service is accessible).

translate_tooltip_desc.message: Tip: The Deep Translation Enhancement Engine improved and replaced the translated content on the page.

select_text_doing.message: What would you like to do with the text?

quota_insufficiently_update.message: Upgrade to Glarity Pro/Plus to Continue Receiving High-Quality Answers from GPT-4

option_subtitle_translate_icon_show_desc.message: Provides a shortcut for bilingual subtitles at the top right of the page, a feature currently available only on the YouTube platform.

option_subtitle_translate_icon_show_neve.message: Don't display the bilingual subtitles icon on the page

sidebar_tip.message: Access the sidebar through the icon located in the lower right corner of the page. You can drag to move it up and down

test_key_fail.message: The request failed, please reconfigure the key.

translation_line_feed_desc.message: Always line feeds are used for less content and are neater.

translation_style_desc.message: Glarity : an ChatGPT Summary extension for YouTube, Google, Twitter, and any webpage. It provides cross-language summaries to effortlessly summarize videos, searches, PDFs, emails, and webpages. It supports free side-by-side translations, email writing assistance, Web Content Q&A, and much more!

hasLogin_noFree_day_text.message: Your free daily limit is maxed out. It resets tomorrow, or upgrade now for unlimited access

chatgpt_not_support_tranlation_tip.message: Due to weak concurrency capabilities, the ChatGPT webapp mode cannot support this translation engine. Please use other translation engine. Or switch to another AI provider

youtube_auto_copy_tip.message: After enabling auto copy for YouTube summaries, the summary content will be copied to the clipboard after each YouTube summary.

youtube_auto_copy_always.message: After enabling, the summary content will always be copied to the clipboard after each YouTube summary.

youtube_auto_copy_manually.message: After disabling, the summary content will need to be manually copied to the clipboard after each YouTube summary.
